pullRequest.title: Store and use only internal security headers
pullRequest.bodyText: Tighten the flow of the HTTP Authorization header.

nodes.bodyText: No problem here, but refactoring to make it also go through a method that filters the headers, for good measure.
Unfortunately, I cannot link to the the ClientHelper methods that do the filtering (different proj).
Not really a problem, but good measure.
